title: Danielle Lloyd returned to glamour modelling after cosmetic procedures made her feel 'womanly again'
text:
Danielle Lloyd has revealed that she decided to return to glamour modelling after cosmetic surgery made her feel 'womanly again.'

The mother-of-four, 35, told Closer magazine that after going under the knife for a breast augmentation, liposuction and a Brazilian bum life in September, she feels happier and more confident than ever.

Danielle went onto say that since her surgery she has set up an OnlyFans account to display her jaw-dropping physique, and her husband Micheal O'Neill fully supports her decision.

New look: Danielle Lloyd has revealed that she decided to return to glamour modelling with an OnlyFans account (pictured) after cosmetic surgery made her feel 'womanly again.'

Danielle candidly revealed that after suffering a miscarriage earlier this year she struggled with weight gain, and following her wedding to Michael in April she battled low self-esteem.

The star eventually decided that it was time to fix her so-called 'wonky boobs,' after a botched reconstruction in 2016.

After jetting to Turkey to have her boobs done at the same surgical clinic used by Katie Price, Danielle quickly decided to have the liposuction and bum lift too.

Transformed: The star underwent a breast augmentation to fix her so-called 'wonky' breasts along with liposuction and a Brazilian bum lift (pictured before the procedures in April)

The reality TV star added: 'My surgeon said he needed to take fat from my stomach to reconstruct my left breast, but then he suggested putting some of the excess fat into my bum and hips to give me a nice shape. I said, ''Go on then, get it in there! Why not?''

Danielle has previously spoken about struggling with her breasts, after a reconstruction to fix botched implants.

The star admitted that the replacement implants had a serious effect on her health, as her body tried to fight them it left her feeling 'sick and drained.'

Sizzling: Danielle worked as a glamour model for many years (pictured in 2007) and decided to return to the work after seeing her transformed figure

But after the surgery Danielle gushed that she's never felt more confident, saying: 'When I came round and saw my boobs, I literally cried my eyes out. I couldn't stop hugging them. They're still healing, but I'm so happy.

'I was desperate to feel womanly again. Now I can't wait to go on holiday - I'll wear the most ''itsy bitsy'' bikini I can find!'

The star also revealed that she's since set up an OnlyFans account to post racy snaps, officially marking her return to glamour modelling.

She explained that husband Michael has no problem with her sensual snaps, and despite her new figure, the couple are still planning to try for a fifth child in their quest for a baby girl.
description: The mother-of-four, 35, said that after going under the knife for a breast augmentation, liposuction and a Brazilian bum life in September, she feels happier and more confident than ever.
